name: The Pirate Bay (API)
author: Kiyomi Community
description: The Pirate Bay (TPB) is a free searchable online index of movies, music, video games, and software.

name: Nyaa (Anime/Asian Media)
author: Kiyomi Community
description: Nyaa is a BitTorrent community focused on Eastern Asian media including anime, manga, music, and more.

name: Anime Tosho (Torznab API)
author: Kiyomi Staff
description: Anime Tosho is a free, automated service which mirrors most torrents posted on TokyoTosho's anime category and Nyaa.si's English translated anime category onto various DDL services, as well as Usenet.

name: ACG.RIP (Chinese Anime RSS)
author: Kiyomi Staff
description: ACG.RIP hosts Chinese and Japanese Anime, music and more that are otherwise not found elsewhere.

name: Knaben (API)
author: Knaben Developers
description: Knaben is a modern, fast search API that offers structured results, allowing for precise filtering and high-speed data retrieval.

name: TorrentsCSV (API)
author: Kiyomi Community
description: TorrentsCSV provides simple, clean JSON API access to torrent data, listing torrent name, infohash, size (in raw bytes), and seeders.

name: LimeTorrents (Public RSS)
author: Kiyomi Community
description: LimeTorrents is a General Torrents Download indexer with mostly Verified Torrents like Movies, Games, Music, TV Shows, Anime and more.
